blog.name: madmagic-comic
blog.description:
Kicked out of the Academy of Magic as a teenager before she could finish her studies in witchcraft, Joy Kaplan is a talentless mess, living a life of expedients in the normal world. Although, the place she choose to live in, is pretty far from normal... 
Updates every TUESDAY & THURSDAY

SUPPORT buy a BOOK:
https://gumroad.com/illuminated

summary:
Older
than the rest of the girls, Vivika Vounds had been forced to repeat a few years
for low grades and criminal absenteeism....
caption:
Older than the rest of the girls, Vivika Vounds had been forced to repeat a few years for low grades and criminal absenteeism.

bookofdoomed: Many, many, many years ago, I studied Justine in university. To see it now used for a joke in a webcomic makes me flashback to them halcyon days.

I’m glad I could be of help. I didn’t study it in any school, I researched it on my own for… reasons.

You can now vote for Mad Magic on TopWebComics.

Just follow this >>link<<

blog.name: tayloristhecontent
blog.title: Next Stop NOLA 18/01
blog.description: You can call me Ash. Thirty one and still growing up now. This blog is about loving Taylor and loving you all. I will reach out to you. I got a full palm high five off Taylor and I’m absolutely taking that. I never get no notes on nuffin except this one time when Tay liked my post and my broken bones mended. I live in permanent countdown to the times I get to spend with @ekswiftie. I live blog Taylor events at #ash live. @islandbreezeee made my banner.

summary: Guys, Hufflepuff is the most inclusive among the four houses; valuing hard work, dedication, patience, loyalty, and fair play...
body:
Anyone who thinks @taylorswift isn’t a Hufflepuff has gone off the deep end.

Guys, Hufflepuff is the most inclusive among the four houses; valuing hard work, dedication, patience, loyalty, and fair play rather than a particular aptitude in its members.

THIS WHOLE FANDOM IS HUFFLEPUFF!

blog.description: Dirk/Vriska|They/She |About| icon by esperlesbian| Art blog

summary:
I don’t have time to draw or write but here’s some of my characters for my Harry Potter fanfiction
Vera
Hufflepuff! She’s...
body:
I don’t have time to draw or write but here’s some of my characters for my Harry Potter fanfiction

Vera

Hufflepuff! She’s muggleborn and British with a set of cousins that are also magical, her wand has unicorn core really sweet but when you make her mad she is a stone cold person and would give a lot of silent treatment

She has dark brown hair around but shorter than shoulder length and light brown eyes

Aubrey

Slytherin! She’s a pure blood Scottish person who has traditional parents who ship her to the train station even if hogwarts is in scottland. She’s ambitious and wants to make the world a better place, a feminist and really sarcastic.

She’s tall and has light blonde hair up to her shoulders with green eyes and freckles (yes that’s really rare I know)

Brian

Gryffindor! He’s a half blood Filipino who immigrated to Britain, he loves to help people although he’s a bit shy, he loves to learn more about other people and is very smart. He doesn’t really like Harry Potter for stealing the spot he wanted in quidditch

He shaved both sides of his head except for the top, he has dark brown eyes. And is pretty short


Aaron

Ravenclaw! He’s a full blooded British who is smug and confident with his answers. He doesn’t like to study and is known to wing it or study just the day before a test. He is usually cold to strangers and doesn’t often talk that much, although he does have a secret!


He has messy red hair and grey eyes, he’s just as tall as Vera.

blog.name: skythespork
blog.title: Skylar ☁
blog.description:
Midnight thoughts are what fuel me. Well and coffee.


Pronouns: They/Them

title: Hogwarts RP With My Bestie
body:
My friend and I have a Instagram role-play where we attend Hogwarts, We each have a character we made up to date. Dan and Phil are there and are our friends. So me being me I made collage edits for each pairing, all the pairings are inter-house relationships.

Skylar Gabriel Wilson-Laurie (me) & Mable Lily-Ann Rose

I’m a Slytherin and Mable is a Hufflepuff. I made a second Pottermore account and took the quiz as Mable and she got Hufflepuff. (kim did the same for josh)

Kimberly Nicole Walker & Joshua Stone Woods

Nicole (kim) is a Ravenclaw and Josh is a Slytherin

Daniel James Howell & Philip Michael Lester

Dan is a Gryffindor and Phil is a Hufflepuff.

title: Just Give Up
body:
James: WORMTAIL HELP
James: SIRIUS HAS GONE AWOL AND DESERTED ME
James: YOU ARE MY ONLY HOPE
Peter: Prongs, piece of advice: just give up. It's the Pettigrew way. It's why our family crest is a white flag. 
James: ... REMUS HELP YOU ARE MY ONLY HOPE!?!?

dialogue.label: James:

blog.title: 𝔴𝔥𝔦𝔠𝔥𝔴𝔦𝔱𝔠𝔥𝔴𝔯𝔦𝔱𝔢𝔰
blog.description: Welcome to a world of head cannons, stories, aesthetics, siriusly bad puns and more.

title: James & Sirius, brothers forever
body:
I hate you. I love you.
It's like I want to throw you off the top of the Gryffindor tower, (oooh no the Astronomy tower) then rush to the bottom to catch you. 

BONUS;
James: I f*cked up, I f*cked up. 
Sirius: *falling* JAMES WHAT THE F*CK
Sirius: I'M TOO PRETTY AND IN LOVE WITH MOONY TO DIE

Let's be honest, out of the two of them, Sirius would be the first one to be thrown off that tower.

dialogue.phrase: I hate you. I love you.
It's like I want to throw you off the top of the Gryffindor tower, (oooh no the Astronomy tower) then rush to the bottom to catch you.

dialogue.phrase: I f*cked up, I f*cked up.

dialogue.name: Sirius
dialogue.label: Sirius:
dialogue.phrase: I'M TOO PRETTY AND IN LOVE WITH MOONY TO DIE
Let's be honest, out of the two of them, Sirius would be the first one to be thrown off that tower.

blog.name: rain-at-midnight
blog.title: yo fam
blog.description:
i’m a pro bin weevils player so i win at life.

fight me.

body:
harry potter problems- no1

plot holes in harry potter - version 1

oml dumbledore is so manipulative i swear to god

i mean he was all like voldemort must kill you sorry there is no other way

and as far as i can tell never did anything to find out how to get rid of the horcrux

he just decided that he had to die

and i thought when you destroy a horcrux you have to use like basalisk venom or something that destructive

like why didn’t harry just AK all the other horcruxes aswell ! ?

also i’m sorry but that theory that dumbledore is a timetravelling ron weasley is the most stupid thing ever

there’s literally no evidence for it except that jk rowling hasn’t said its wrong

but then if you use that theory then literally anything could be true

like i could campaign for like ron and umbridge having a secret affair, and because jk rowling never said it’s wrong it must be right !

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: Remus: Synonyms are weird because if you invite someone to your cottage in the forest, that just sounds nice and cozy, but if I...
body:
Remus: Synonyms are weird because if you invite someone to your cottage in the forest, that just sounds nice and cozy, but if I invite you to my cabin in the woods, you’re going to die.

Sirius: My favourite is “butt dial” vs “booty call”.

Remus: It’s called connotation.

Marlene: Also, “forgive me father, for I have sinned” vs. “sorry daddy, I’ve been very naughty”.

Lily: Great news! Language is now cancelled!

reblog.comment:

Remus: It’s called connotation.

Marlene: Also, “forgive me father, for I have sinned” vs. “sorry daddy, I’ve been very naughty”.

Lily: Great news! Language is now cancelled!

Lily: Great news! Language is now cancelled!

tags: lily and remus are bros fight me
summary: It's a tough line to walk
title: It's a tough line to walk
body:
Sirius: Sure hope I don't sprain my arm during this race, 'cause I'm gonna be opening up a lot of doors for Moony on our date. Oh, yeah, I'm gonna be a gentleman.
Lily: What are you doing, Black? 
Sirius: Trash talking you, while simultaneously proving that I will be respectful to Remus. It's a tough line to walk; as I know out of us, you'd be the one to kill me. James is in love with me, and Peter is a wimp. 
Lily: ... tru

dialogue.label: Sirius:
dialogue.phrase: Sure hope I don't sprain my arm during this race, 'cause I'm gonna be opening up a lot of doors for Moony on our date. Oh, yeah, I'm gonna be a gentleman.

blog.name: aussieswift
blog.title: DAISY 🤠💘💕
blog.description: New Romantics, Stay Stay Stay and Love story Stan ♡Australian swiftie ♡ 14 ♡ Rep and 1989 tours Sydney ♡

summary: I cried so many happy tears when I saw the gorgeous photo of @taylorswift with JK Rowling last night in London. These...
body: I cried so many happy tears when I saw the gorgeous photo of @taylorswift with JK Rowling last night in London. These inspirational women have helped me through so much with there use of words to create something magical and beautiful ♡ I am so happy that my two heroes met each other ♡

reblog.comment: I cried so many happy tears when I saw the gorgeous photo of @taylorswift with JK Rowling last night in London. These inspirational women have helped me through so much with there use of words to create something magical and beautiful ♡ I am so happy that my two heroes met each other ♡

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application
